trans-unit.source: Monitor usage and statistics in an Azure Search service
trans-unit.target: Monitor usage and statistics in an Azure Search service

trans-unit.source: Track resource consumption and index size for Azure Search
trans-unit.target: Track resource consumption and index size for Azure Search

trans-unit.source: Tracking the growth of indexes and document size can help you proactively adjust capacity before hitting the upper limit you've established for your service.
trans-unit.target: Tracking the growth of indexes and document size can help you proactively adjust capacity before hitting the upper limit you've established for your service.

trans-unit.source: To monitor resource usage, counts and statistics are easily viewed in the <linkText>Azure portal</linkText><title></title>, but you can also obtain the information programmatically if you are building a custom service administration tool.
trans-unit.target: To monitor resource usage, counts and statistics are easily viewed in the <linkText>Azure portal</linkText><title></title>, but you can also obtain the information programmatically if you are building a custom service administration tool.

trans-unit.source: This article covers the steps for both techniques.
trans-unit.target: This article covers the steps for both techniques.

trans-unit.source: Sign in to the <linkText>Azure portal</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: Sign in to the <linkText>Azure portal</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: Open the service dashboard of your Azure Search service.
trans-unit.target: Open the service dashboard of your Azure Search service.

trans-unit.source: Tiles for the service can be found on the Home page, or you can browse to the service from Browse on the JumpBar.
trans-unit.target: Tiles for the service can be found on the Home page, or you can browse to the service from Browse on the JumpBar.

trans-unit.source: See <linkText>Create a service</linkText><title></title> for step-by-step instructions.
trans-unit.target: See <linkText>Create a service</linkText><title></title> for step-by-step instructions.

trans-unit.source: The Usage section includes a meter that tells you what portion of available resources are currently in use.
trans-unit.target: The Usage section includes a meter that tells you what portion of available resources are currently in use.

trans-unit.source: Recall that the shared service has a maximum of one replica and partition each.
trans-unit.target: Recall that the shared service has a maximum of one replica and partition each.

trans-unit.source: Additionally, it can only support 10,000 documents in total or 50 MB of data, whichever comes first.
trans-unit.target: Additionally, it can only support 10,000 documents in total or 50 MB of data, whichever comes first.

trans-unit.source: Both the Azure Search REST API and the .NET SDK provide programmatic access to service metrics.
trans-unit.target: Both the Azure Search REST API and the .NET SDK provide programmatic access to service metrics.

trans-unit.source: If you are using <linkText>indexers</linkText><title></title> to load an index from Azure SQL Database or DocumentDB, an additional API is available to get the numbers you require.
trans-unit.target: If you are using <linkText>indexers</linkText><title></title> to load an index from Azure SQL Database or DocumentDB, an additional API is available to get the numbers you require.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Get Index Statistics</linkText><title></title>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Get Index Statistics</linkText><title></title>

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Count Documents</linkText><title></title>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Count Documents</linkText><title></title>

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Get Indexer Status</linkText><title></title>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Get Indexer Status</linkText><title></title>

trans-unit.source: Review <linkText>Limits and capacity</linkText><title></title> to determine the combination of partitions and replicas you'll need if existing capacity is insufficient.
trans-unit.target: Review <linkText>Limits and capacity</linkText><title></title> to determine the combination of partitions and replicas you'll need if existing capacity is insufficient.

trans-unit.source: Visit <linkText>Manage your Search service on Microsoft Azure</linkText><title></title> for more information on service administration.
trans-unit.target: Visit <linkText>Manage your Search service on Microsoft Azure</linkText><title></title> for more information on service administration.
